commit message:
New logo for MCT. Thanks to Beneke Traub.

http://www.beneketraub.com/
Updated the logo in the help & infos section.

Added licence for logo.

Changed font face to 'sans serif'.
MCT can be used in 'offline' mode on devices with no NFC.
Made some messages more understandable and consistent.
Improved readability of the readme.
Fixed repesentation of SAK and ATS in the tag info tool.
Updated project (source, structure, etc.) to Android Studio.
Improved .gitignore.
Updated manifest and lint file for Android Studio.
Removed unused Proguard/minify build rules.
Removed deprecated 'eclipse' section from readme.
Samsung Galaxy S5 900P (Sprint) is not supported.
Added bare bone of 'Incr./Decr. Value Block'.
Check values entered by user (write Value Block).
Create key map for Value Block.
Implemented incr./decr. function for Value Blocks.
Replaced 'Write new Value' strings by 'Write Value Block'.
Added section about incr./derc. Value Blocks in Help and Info.
Fixed typo.
Major (cosmetic) code cleanup & typo fixes.
Huawei G620S and Xiaomi MI 3 are not supported.

Fix the monospace font issue of the diff tool for Android 5.0+.

This is just a workaround. The real issue is unsolved...
https://code.google.com/p/android-developer-preview/issues/detail?id=110
Just use a 21.x support library (and not a specific version).
Moved launcher icons to new mipmap-* folders.
Use the launcher icons from the new locations.
Added hi-res launcher icon of the donate version for Google Play.

New release: 2.0.0

Updated changelog.
Increased version number.
